sourcesContent:
<style></style>

<template>
    <button @click="get_message()">
        获取
    </button>
</template>
<script>
import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
export default {
    mounted() {
        Cookies.set('skey', 'e90XIBSI', { expires: 7 });
        Cookies.set('vid', '442726869', { expires: 7 });
    },
    methods: {
        get_message() {
            let url = "http://127.0.0.1:5000/weread/info"
            fetch(url, {
                method: 'POST',
                credentials: 'include' // 或者 POST 等其他请求方法，按需调整
            }).then(response => response.json())
                .then(jsonData => console.log(jsonData))
                .catch(error => console.error("获取用户信息时出现 bug " + error));

        }
    }
};
</script>
